name: Changing the first or last element of an array
instruction:
Write a function `changeElement` that takes one parameter, an array of numbers.

If the length of the array is even, add to the value of the last element the value of the penultimate one.
If the length of the array is odd, cube the value of the first element.

The function should return the naked array.

An example of running the function:
```javascript
changeElement([1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]); // [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 11]
changeElement([2, 3, 4, 5, 6]); // [8, 3, 4, 5, 6]
```
